item.title: Help with a req
item.dc:creator: @omgwater omgwater
item.description:
@omgwater wrote:

ok i have this peice bit from czar vengeance…

how do i make it so that it it requires you to need a item such as… umm a whip equiped to cast this?

case 161: { if(actionTimer == 0){ { actionTimer = 10; stillgfx(64, absY, absX); for(int I = 0; I < 20; I++) { } for(int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break; } inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); setAnimation(1979); txt4 = "Taste vengeance!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); } } } break;
